attributes.action: ensure that Network Rail re-build the Euston Arch as part of the Euston station redevelopment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Euston Arch was built in 1837 and demolished in 1961. It was one of the finest pieces of Victorian architcture on the British Railway network and was demolished amidst considerable public opposition.

The new 1960s station at Euston is architecturally nondescript and the station has no proper frontage. 

Network Rail have announced plans to rebuild Euston, and this would be the perfect time to re-build the arch.
